p: Many studies have revealed the benefits of consuming vegetables from Brassicaceae and moringaceae, which are the main sources of ITCs. These compounds are considered to contribute to the massive reduction of risk for the development of neurodegenerative diseases, due to their antiamyloidogenic, antioxidant, and anti-inflammatory properties. The preventive and treatment capacity of ITCs for NDDs is being extensively explored over the last years [ 135].
